solution_line_template: Each of Noah's closets can fit {ali_closet_capacity} * {fraction_capacity} = <<{ali_closet_capacity}*{fraction_capacity}={noah_single_closet_capacity}>>{noah_single_closet_capacity} pairs of jeans.

Combined, both his closets can fit {noah_single_closet_capacity} * {num_noah_closets} = <<{noah_single_closet_capacity}*{num_noah_closets}={total_noah_closet_capacity}>>{total_noah_closet_capacity} pairs of jeans.
